issueOrder(String) - Method in class com.soen6441.risk_game_u14.model.Player
The issue order method evaluates the order given by the player, which falls into one of five types: Deploy Order: Deploys the specified number of armies to the designated country. Advance Order: Initiates an attack on the target country with a specified number of armies from the source country. Bomb Order: Launches a bombing operation on a specified country. Blockade Order: Transforms the player's own country into a neutral territory by tripling its current armies. AirLift Order: Moves armies from the source country to a target country, even if they are not neighbors. Negotiate Order: Establishes a diplomatic agreement between the issuing player and another player, preventing attacks on each other's countries.
IssueOrder - Class in com.soen6441.risk_game_u14.state
The IssueOrder Phase extends the phase class and implements all the methods suitable for that particular phase.
IssueOrder(GameEngine) - Constructor for class com.soen6441.risk_game_u14.state.IssueOrder
This is the constructor of IssueOrder class which initializes Game engine object and command prompt object and assigning log entry buffer This then calls the issue order method .

IssueOrderTest() - Constructor for class com.soen6441.risk_game_u14.state.IssueOrderTest
 
isValid() - Method in class com.soen6441.risk_game_u14.order.Advance
This method validates the order and identifies several conditions that render the order invalid: When the issuing player is currently in negotiations with the owner of the target country. When the sourceCountry and the targetCountry are identical. When the sourceCountry and the targetCountry are not neighboring territories. When the sourceCountry is left with fewer than one army after the order has been executed with a specific number of armies. This method returns different integers based on various valid or invalid execution cases: It returns an integer of 1 when both countries involved in the order belong to the issuing player. An integer of 2 is returned when the countries belong to different players.
isValid() - Method in class com.soen6441.risk_game_u14.order.Airlift
This function evaluates the Airlift order's validity.
isValid() - Method in class com.soen6441.risk_game_u14.order.Blockade
Checks the validity of the blockade order issued by the player.
isValid() - Method in class com.soen6441.risk_game_u14.order.Bomb
This method checks the validity of the Bomb order.
isValid() - Method in class com.soen6441.risk_game_u14.order.Deploy
This method checks the validity of the issued deploy order.
